text: Ezɨ ensel uaghan kamaghɨn akam akunasa na mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim ghaze, An nguibar ekiaba bizir aghuir avɨriba dagh izɨvagham. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba deraghvɨra ikiam. Ikiavɨra Itir God, gavgavim ua Saion danɨngtɨ, a ua tugh gavgavigham. Egh ua baghvɨra uam Jerusalem ginabagham.”
